people are affected by Duchenne and Becker muscular dystrophy ?,"Duchenne and Becker muscular dystrophies together affect 1 in 3,500 to 5,000 newborn males worldwide. Between 400 and 600 boys in the United States are born with these conditions each year.",GHR,Duchenne and Becker muscular dystrophy
